ygData.subject: Re: Pulsating brood clutch (off-topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Equestrielle now looks like you would expect a unicorn to look, all white.  If anyone wants to check her out, I think she spawns in the NW corner of Lesser
ygData.messageBody:
> First time I saw Equestrielle was in beta4, it was a black horse with red
> eyes and no horn, looked kind of like a nightmare(sp?) from AD&D, but it
> wasn't aggressive. Crookstinger is probly about as new as Equestrielle.
> Not
> sure about the named faerie.
>
>
Equestrielle now looks like you would expect a unicorn to look, all
white. If anyone wants to check her out, I think she spawns in the NW
corner of Lesser Faydark and then generally moves in a SE direction (at
least thats what she did last night on several occasions). We were on the
ridge directly south of the northern bandit camp and she walked right by us.
Very majestic looking and a pleasant surprise.

Galtin
E'ci
